title: US Stocks Rise as Dollar Weakens and Precious Metals Rally | The Close 1/26/2026
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are Niles Investment Management’s Dan Niles, Top CallsEverCore ISI’s Amit Daryanani, Bank of America’s Carlos Fernandez-Aller, Glenmede’s Jason Pride, Ned Davis Research’s Ed Clissold, EverCore ISI’s Sarah Bianchi, Revelio Labs’ Ben Zweig, Omaha Steaks’ Nate Rempe. (Source: Bloomberg)
